description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Wrote 'Align The Misaligned' and curated a course with the same title focusing on personal growth and startup alignment.
blurb: The internet's fragmentation mimics the physical world. Ecosystem architecture combines decentralization and regenerative design to transform digital fragments into seeds for a vibrant future.
